briefTitle: Omega 3 Fatty Acids in Patients With Chronic Renal Disease

eligibilityModule.eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

* Urinary albumin excretion over 30 mg/g creatinin
* Chronic renal failure stage 2 to 4
* Absence of serious conditions such as c√°ncer, decompensated heart failure, chronic infections and severe arterial lesions

Exclusion Criteria:

* Blood glucose levels over 180 mg/dl or glycosilated hemoglobin over 8%
* Presence of cognitive impairment that does not allow to sigin a written informed consent
* Alcohol or illicit drug abuse

outcomeMeasures.title: Number of Participants With a Urine Albumin Excretion Decrease of 20% or More
outcomeMeasures.description: Number of participants in whom urine albumin excretion in a spot urine sample at the end of follow up, expressed as mg/g creatinine, decreased by 20% or more

outcomeMeasures.title: Change in C Reactive Protein Levels at 12 Weeks of Intervention
outcomeMeasures.description: Blood C reactive protein measured at baseline and the end of the intervention.

outcomeMeasures.title: Change in Pulse Wave Velocity at 12 Weeks of Intervention
outcomeMeasures.description: Measurement of pulse wave velocity using a oscillometric device measured at baseline and end of follow up and expressed ad m/s
